official_title: A bill to repeal section 131 of title 13, United States Code, providing for mid-decade censuses of manufactures, mineral industries, and other businesses.

summary.text: Eliminates the mid-decade census of manufacturers, mineral industries, and other businesses. (Repeals 13 U.S.C. 131)

titles.title: A bill to repeal section 131 of title 13, United States Code, providing for mid-decade censuses of manufactures, mineral industries, and other businesses.
